bike.description: S-Works FACT 10m carbon hardtail, Az1 constuction, Mono-stay seatstays, forged dropouts w/ disc mount and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: 1 1/8" threadless, Campy spec integrated sealed cartridge bearing
Alloy single bolt, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frames
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
